book.synopsis: Two teens see how the other half lives! She: cute but obnoxious, pretty but violent, petite but rude. He: shy and slender and secretly in love with her. When her mad scientist grandfather accidentally switches their bodies - it"s freaky Friday, Saturday, Sunday, and every day! Akira Uehara is mortified when his best buddy starts hitting on
